page.title: 10LOCAL NEWS IN COLYTON part 1
page.content: There are several newspapers in the area ie.The Mid-Week Herald.The following extracts have come from these papers. Vandalism:Vandals have cost the Colyton Parish Council over Â£300 for repairs to Colyton's playing field.It cost Â£260 to repair plaster and skirting boards alone. Roads-Proposed traffic lights for Colyton have dropped down the county council's list of priorities because the area is not dangerous enough. St. John's Ambulance at Colyton have had their debt cleared by a donation of Â£1500 by Abbeyfield Society Ltd. in Colyton.A second hand ambulance was to be bought but a new Ford Transit was bought and converted.This was because the town needed a new ambulance.
